events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in days.
The reported issue has been classified as a delivery delay due to customer complaint about late shipment status.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in logistics and shipping delays.
Hello, this is Jamie from support. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status with our delivery partner?
The order number is 56789XYZ and the shipping address is 123 Maple Drive, Springfield. I appreciate your help.
I contacted the courier and they reported a delay due to weather conditions. We expect your package to arrive within the next 3 days.
Thank you for the update. It’s disappointing but I understand the weather situation. I’ll wait a few more days.
Your package has been delivered according to the latest shipment confirmation. Please let us know if everything is in order.
We are following up to ensure your order was received and to ask if you need any further assistance regarding your delivery.
Since the package was successfully delivered and there are no further issues, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
